mapper.update: MERGE INTO DATA_PROCESSOR_STATE state USING ( SELECT #{localSiteId} SITE_ID, #{remoteParamId} AQ_TIMESERIES_UNIQUE_ID, #{lastNewPullStart} LAST_NEW_DATA_PULL_START, #{lastNewPullEnd} LAST_NEW_DATA_PULL_END FROM DUAL ) record ON ( state.SITE_ID = record.SITE_ID AND state.AQ_TIMESERIES_UNIQUE_ID = record.AQ_TIMESERIES_UNIQUE_ID ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET state.LAST_NEW_DATA_PULL_START = record.LAST_NEW_DATA_PULL_START, state.LAST_NEW_DATA_PULL_END = record.LAST_NEW_DATA_PULL_END WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( SITE_ID, AQ_TIMESERIES_UNIQUE_ID, LAST_NEW_DATA_PULL_START, LAST_NEW_DATA_PULL_END) VALUES ( record.SITE_ID, record.AQ_TIMESERIES_UNIQUE_ID, record.LAST_NEW_DATA_PULL_START, record.LAST_NEW_DATA_PULL_END )
mapper.sql: SELECT 9251000 localSiteId, 5 localParamId, '08374550' remoteSiteId, '21705b8e5c7a49f6be3aeb86923ea374' remoteParamId, '00065' pCode, TIMESTAMP '2016-11-8 08:00:00.00 -06:00' neverPullBefore, TIMESTAMP '2016-11-9 08:00:00.00 -06:00' neverPullAfter, null lastNewPullStart, null lastNewPullEnd FROM dual

SELECT conf.SITE_ID localSiteId, grp.GROUP_ID localParamId, site.NWIS_SITE_NO remoteSiteId, conf.AQ_TIMESERIES_UNIQUE_ID remoteParamId, grp.PARM_CD pCode, conf.NEVER_PULL_DATA_BEFORE_DATE neverPullBefore, conf.NEVER_PULL_DATA_AFTER_DATE neverPullAfter, state.LAST_NEW_DATA_PULL_START lastNewPullStart, state.LAST_NEW_DATA_PULL_END lastNewPullEnd FROM gdaws_aq_sync_config conf INNER JOIN site_star site ON conf.site_id = site.site_id INNER JOIN group_name grp ON grp.group_id = conf.group_id LEFT OUTER JOIN DATA_PROCESSOR_STATE state ON conf.AQ_TIMESERIES_UNIQUE_ID = state.AQ_TIMESERIES_UNIQUE_ID ORDER BY conf.SITE_ID, conf.GROUP_ID
